channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024101569
item.description:
Report X-2024101569

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-27T18:24:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-19
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND PLASTIC DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. DRUM WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE THEN DECONTAMINATED AND DRUM WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT.

item.title: Report X-2024101428
item.description:
Report X-2024101428

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-24T09:29:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-15
  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOAD SOUTH CALLED IN A LEAKER. WHEN RESPONDER ARRIVED, THE BOX WAS STILL INSIDE OF THE TRAILER. SHIPPING CONTAINER REMOVED AND TRANSPORTED TO DMP. RESPONDER DISCOVERED THAT THE PIN HAD BROKEN WHICH ALLOWED FOR THE VALVE TO OPEN

item.title: Report X-2024101375
item.description:
Report X-2024101375

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-23T09:14:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-05
  • City: SPOKANE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/5/2024 at approxiamtely 1230, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 260014 at the station location in Spokane, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. The shipment consists for one aerosol can packaged in a padded envelope. The shipment was discovered after having the distinct rattling sound. The shipment was not prepared in accordance in IATA Regulations, missing the required markings, labeling, packaging and paperwork. The shipment is being held, pending an FAA investigation.
